Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "search and replace text" (#529) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "Not able to open VS 2015 solution (Community/Professional) with GitHub" (#554) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Description**

While opening VS2015 (Community/Professional), the VS just scans GitHub repo and automatically closes after 10 secs or so.

**Observed**

On Opening VS2015 it is just keeps scanning GitHub repository and then after 10secs or so VS solution closes automatically.

**Expected**

I was able to open the solution since last 8 month after migration from TFSto GitHub.

Events.RelatedBody:
dotnet build OpenXmlPowerTools.sln

apparently notepad isn't the way to edit this file as it shows everythign changed but I just added 

using System.Diagnostics;

as line 3 or it wouldn't compile for me.
